title: Nasi lemak
description: Nasi lemak, a spicy coconut rice, is the national dish of Malaysia, where it is eaten for breakfast. If that is a little too adventurous, it makes a great weekend dinner for friends.
ingredients: thumb-sized piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
1 piece pandan leaf, tied in a knot, to serve
250g/9oz dried anchovies, soaked in water and drained
250ml/9fl oz tamarind paste mixed with 400ml/13fl oz water
